metadata.title: Solbari UPF 50+ Women's Long Sleeve Polo Fitness Shirt - UV Protection, Sun Protective
features: Moisture wicking, hard wearing, super comfotable, anti-odor, breathable and soft, this top is ideal to wear for all your outdoor activities in the sun.
Flattering feminine fit and fits true to size. Not baggy or skin tight.
88% polyester, 12% spandex / machine wash, line dry / Imported.
Thumbholes to cover the back of hands and help prevent sun spots and premature skin aging.
Recommended by medical experts to maintain a healthy skin, tested and rated UPF 50+ in Australia.
description: Lightweight, moisture wicking and super comfortable; the Long Sleeve Polo Top will keep you protected while looking and feeling great in the outdoors. It keeps your skin healthy, so you can be active all day in the sun with confidence.

Accredited with a UPF50+ rating, it blocks more than 98% of UVA and UVB rays and is equivalent to wearing SPF50+ sunscreen all day long Recommended by medical experts to maintain a healthy skin and help prevent skin cancer and melanoma Super soft, comfortable and anti-odor Tested and rated for anti-pill, doesnâ€™t shrink and keeps its color after wash Long sleeves, discreet thumbholes to cover the back of hands and a generous collar for added sun protection Gentle on the skin
Designed, tested and rated UPF50+ in Australia 88% moisture wicking polyester, 12% Spandex Placket with 3 white Solbari embossed buttons Easy care: machine wash, hang to dry and no need to iron
